timeline.message:
CDPD-8316 Add YARN to OpDB

* YARN Service added to OpDB template
* Disable HDFS DataNode cache
* Reduce HBase RegionServer heap to 7GB
* Reduce HBase BucketCache to 6.5GB

timeline.bodyText: This is quite static, and users can select machines with 32GB or even 128GB memory and in every case, the heap is going to be locked down to 7G
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: Yes, we are aware of this but in CM there is no way to specify these values as the percentage of host memory. In case a user changes the machine to have more memory they can also override the memory for the services. I believe this is documented and we also highlighted this for SMEs on the recent training.
replies.author: petersomogyi

replies.bodyText:
